entry.name: High_Beam
entry.description: This is the actuation signal for the headlight high beam state

entry.name: Low_Beam
entry.description: This is the actuation signal for the headlight low beam state

entry.name: Park_Lights
entry.description: This is the actuation signal for the headlight park lights state

entry.name: Vehicle_Speed
entry.description: The ego vehicle speed in kilometer per hour

entry.name: Car_Detected
entry.description: If a car from the opposite direction is detected, this signal is True, otherwise, it is False

entry.name: HBA_Signal
entry.description: This is the output signal of the HBA SWC

entry.name: Lever_Position
entry.description: This signal is an enumeration representing the different positions of the Lever at the steering wheel

entry.name: Knob_Position
entry.description: This signal is an enumeration representing the different positions of the Knob at the dashboard

entry.name: HLC_Signal
entry.description: This is the output signal of the HLC SWC

entry.name: Dash_Illuminance
entry.description: This is the value of the calculated illuminance (in lux) determined based on the output voltage of the illuminance sensor

entry.name: Dash_Sensor_Out
entry.description: This is the output of the illuminance sensor in volts

entry.name: Camera_Out
entry.description: This is the output of the 240-by-320 pixel, 8 bit, monochrome camera located at the rear view mirror

entry.name: Threshold_Speed
entry.description: This is the minimum speed at which the high beam can be automatically enabled in automatic headlight operation mode

entry.name: Threshold_Illuminance
entry.description: Everything above this value is considered daytime, everything below it is considered nighttime.

entry.name: Grayscale_Value
entry.description: An unsigned, 8 bit integer representing a grayscale value

entry.name: Threshold_Grayscale
entry.description: This is the grayscale threshold value. Every grayscale value above this threshold value is considered as bright

entry.name: Threshold_Pixels
entry.description: This is the amount of bright pixels in one image. If the amount of bright pixels is above this threshold value, a car has been detected

entry.name: X_Pixel
entry.description: This is the height of the image produced by the monochrome camera in pixels

entry.name: Y_Pixel
entry.description: This is the width of the image produced by the monochrome camera in pixels
